title: Katie Price's ex husbands 'beg her to go to rehab' as her life is 'out of control'
text:

Katie Price's ex husbands are reportedly begging her to go to rehab after a string of sensational claims about her personal life surfaced this week.

Her former toyboy Charles Drury, 22, claimed that she went on regular cocaine binges and would sometimes stay up for days, something her rep has denied.

It came after she lasted just 48 hours on Celebrity SAS and reports that she got kicked out of her ex Dane Bowers' gig for drinking too much.

And now it's claimed that Kieran Hayler and Peter Andre are urging her to get her "out of control" life in order for the sake of her kids.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: PA)

A source told The Sun Online: "[Kieran] wants her to get help. I think both him and Pete feel the same way – they want Katie to sort her life out and get back into a regular routine so the kids know what to expect when they’re at her house.

"Everyone wants her to be happy, and thinks if she takes a step back and gets help, things will be a lot calmer for her and everyone around her.”

"Kieran’s said to her that she needs to get things in hand and put a stop to all of the chaos. He wants to help her but she’s not accepting anyone’s help."

(Image: Instagram)

Katie checked into The Priory last year after she was diagnosed with co-morbid post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD.

It came just after she was filmed rapping about "doing a line" and "I love the coke" before slumping to the floor in a holiday apartment with two German men she had met that evening.

Mirror Online has contacted Katie's reps for comment.

This week Charles claimed Katie was on drugs every day in their relationship and would go for long periods of time without sleep after taking cocaine.

(Image: Facebook)

He said they slept together within hours of first meeting and even accused her of texting married men.

Katie previously admitted to taking cocaine weekly for six months as she struggled to cope with her mum's terminal illness and Kieran's cheating.

A spokesperson for Katie Price said: "There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free - there have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event.

"Katie is still in recovery and making progress."
description: Katie's former toyboy Charles Drury claimed that she went on regular cocaine binges and would sometimes stay up for days
